column5: I was out on the big lake for some salmon and trout this past weekend. Fishing was slow, but I did catch a couple of decent fish and a few smaller ones. A very nice bow @ 33.25 inches and a decent chinook @ 34.75 inches. The bow took off like a bullet, but the chinny was a bleeder and my neighbor asked for one, so it came home. I should be able to get out a few more times in the next couple of weeks. Hope I'll have something else worth posting.  Rainbow trout.   Chinook salmon
Very nice bow and chinook. Looking forward to your next report.
Great report and pics Carp  Real beauts! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Two very nice fish there Remo.  We'll probably get out a few of the next couple weekends ourselves.  Joey
Awesome looking fish there!  Congrats on a nice day out on the water.
Nice fish there Remo.  Good to see that you got out.
That is a big rainbow and not bad salmon. Thanks for posting
